entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
